thread.title: China's Huawei takes aim at Apple, Samsung new Mate S phone as it targets sales of 100 million smartphones a year
thread.title_full: China's Huawei takes aim at Apple, Samsung with new Mate S phone as it targets sales of 100 million smartphones a year - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: China's Huawei takes aim at Apple, Samsung new Mate S phone as it targets sales of 100 million smartphones a year
text: China’s Huawei Technologies unveiled a new smartphone on Wednesday, taking aim at the high end of the market, which is dominated by Apple and Samsung Electronics. »
